title: Senior journalist Anis Alamgir taken in DB custody
body: Senior journalist Anis Alamgir has been taken into custody by the Dhaka Metropolitan Police's Detective Branch (DB) this evening. DMP's DB Chief Shafiqul Islam confirmed the development to The Daily Star, adding that they will question him over some matters. Anis was picked up from a gym in Dhaka's Dhanmondi this evening and taken to the DB office on Minto Road around 7:30 pm, sources said. Anis has worked at several media outlets, including print and electronic media. In recent times, he has drawn attention for his active presence on television talk shows.
